name: FRigUnit_Control_StaticMesh
doc: A control unit used to drive a transform from an external source

MeshTransform: The the transform the mesh will be rendered with (applied on top of the control's transform in the viewport)
Base: The base that transform is relative to
InitTransform: The initial transform that The Transform is initialized to.
Result: The resultant transform of this unit (Base * Filter(Transform))
Filter: The filter determines what axes can be manipulated by the in-viewport widgets
